revised_title: The Development of the Pancreas, Pancreatic, and Hepatic Ducts in Trichosurus vulpecula
tldr: This study investigates the development of the pancreas, pancreatic and hepatic ducts in the marsupial Trichosurus vulpecula. The research examines the embryonic stages and the formation of the gall-bladder and pancreas, providing a detailed account of the development process.
